about_the_game:
In this captivating engineering simulation sandbox game, become a “Metro Station Designer” and bring your vision of modern subway stations to life. Personally craft efficient transit hubs that enhance the commuting experience for thousands.

Build, Simulate, Iterate

With intuitive tools at your disposal, effortlessly design complex multi-layered subway stations. Equip them with essential facilities like stairs, escalators, elevators, and turnstiles. Enjoy a grid-free environment where your creativity can soar, crafting unique passageways and plaza layouts. Utilize a range of tools to effectively manage passenger flow, ensuring satisfaction and seamless travel. Experience the organic operation of your station through real-time simulation of thousands of commuters in motion.

The Perfect Blend of Challenge and Creativity

Whether you prefer structured tasks or unrestricted creative space, “Metro Station Designer” caters to your preferences. In Campaign Mode, tackle over 50 meticulously designed levels, each presenting unique challenges and enjoyment. Have a better idea for a subway station? In Sandbox Mode, unleash your creativity to design your dream station without limits.

Extensive Mod Support

The game offers comprehensive modding support. Create new maps and invite community members to test their skills; share your designs to see if others can refine them further; import a variety of mods to introduce real-world trains and facilities into your maps.

Are you ready to redefine urban transit? In “Metro Station Designer,” challenge yourself to create innovative solutions that are both efficient and enhance passenger satisfaction. The future of urban transit is yours to shape.
